main event: Several witnesses observed an unidentified luminous object in the sky over Warrensburg, Missouri, on 7 October 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light, circular in shape and stationary, disappearing and reappearing at intervals., The sighting lasted for about one hour., Witnesses estimated the object was at an altitude of approximately 5,000 feet., The object was visible in the southern part of the sky and was observed by multiple residents., Investigation mentioned the possibility of balloons or aircraft for previous sightings in the area.
witness description: Residents of Warrensburg, including a civilian employee of the federal government.
